name: Personal Portfolio
desc: A passionate Front-End Developer skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on creating responsive, user-friendly web applications. My portfolio showcases a range of projects highlighting my expertise in UI design, performance optimization, and seamless user experiences. Continuously evolving my skills, I strive to deliver high-quality, innovative solutions

name: Hospital Management
desc: This C++ project offers a complete solution for managing hospital operations, including patient registration, record updating, and database management. It features functionalities for searching, deleting, and restoring patient records, ensuring a streamlined workflow for hospital administrators. The system is designed to maintain an organized and secure database, enhancing operational efficiency.
